name: Appmon
body:
### Welcome to AppMon.
Appmon is a very simple application to monitor which versions of your applications are running on your servers. Appmon is PHP application based on the Symfony2 framework. Download the ZIP file and read the README.md file to find out how to install the application on your server.
tagline: Monitoring applications versions on multiple servers
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
